definition: to restore/to renovate/restoration/(computing) to fix (a bug)
dried meat/private teacher's remuneration/withered/variant of 修[xiu1]

definition: to restore (sth) to (its) former condition/to recover from illness/recovery
to reinstate/to resume/to restore/to recover/to regain/to rehabilitate
to spruce up/to renovate/to tend (a garden)/to groom (one's hair)/to finish (a rough surface)/to trim (a lawn)/to touch up (a photo)
to be reborn/to regenerate/to be a second so-and-so (famous dead person)/recycling/regeneration
to cause damage to/to ruin/to destroy
